sentences.en: A glass of red wine keeps you in the pink.
sentences.cn: 一杯红酒有益健康。

sentences.en: A properly fitting bra should never leave red marks.
sentences.cn: 合适的胸罩不会留下红色勒痕。

sentences.en: a red balloon
sentences.cn: 一个红气球

sentences.en: Bake some big red peppers and hollow them out.
sentences.cn: 将几个大红甜椒烤一烤，再把它们掏空。

sentences.en: Hybridising the two species will reduce the red to orange.
sentences.cn: 将这两个物种杂交后颜色会由红色淡化成橙色。

sentences.en: I didn't mean to break his nose. I just saw red.
sentences.cn: 我不是故意要打断他的鼻梁。我只是一时气急。

sentences.en: I like the way the artist uses red in this painting.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢画家在这幅作品中对红色的运用。

sentences.en: If your skin becomes red, sore or very scaly, consult your doctor.
sentences.cn: 如果皮肤发红、瘙痒或脱皮，要向医生咨询。

sentences.en: It's going to be the death knell of the red deer.
sentences.cn: 这将导致马鹿的灭绝。

sentences.en: Moretti ran a hand through his disordered red hair.
sentences.cn: 莫雷蒂用手理了理他那一头凌乱的红发。

sentences.en: My boyfriend and I robbed a store and were caught red-handed.
sentences.cn: 我和男朋友去抢劫一家商店，被当场逮到了。

sentences.en: nature, red in tooth and claw.
sentences.cn: 野蛮残忍的自然界。

sentences.en: Red, white and blue bunting hung in the city's renovated train station.
sentences.cn: 红、白、蓝彩旗装点着该市修复一新的火车站。

sentences.en: She wore a thick tartan skirt and a red cashmere sweater.
sentences.cn: 她穿了一条厚厚的格子呢裙和一件红色羊绒衫。

sentences.en: The corrections were marked in red (= in red ink ) .
sentences.cn: 修改处用红笔标出。

sentences.en: the mere thought of Piers with Nicole made her see red.
sentences.cn: 她一想到皮尔斯和妮可儿在一起就火冒三丈。

sentences.en: the reds and yellows of the trees
sentences.cn: 红黄斑斓，层林尽染

sentences.en: the refusal to discuss the central issue was like a red rag to a bull.
sentences.cn: 拒绝讨论中心问题像激怒公牛的红布。

sentences.en: The shooting-range is lit from underneath by rows of ruby-red light fittings.
sentences.cn: 射击场被一排排深红色的灯光设备从下面照亮了.

sentences.en: The waiter offered him red wine or white wine with his meal.
sentences.cn: 侍者为他端上佐餐的红葡萄酒或者白葡萄酒。

sentences.en: We painted the door bright red .
sentences.cn: 我们把门漆成鲜红色。

sentences.en: We'll give her some VIP treatment and roll out the red carpet.
sentences.cn: 我们将给予她贵宾级礼遇，并且为她铺设红地毯。

sentences.en: Yemen commands the strait at the southern end of the Red Sea.
sentences.cn: 也门完全控制着红海南端的海峡。

phrases.phrase: (like) a red rag to a bull
better dead than red (或better red than dead)
phrases.tran_cn: （冷战口号）宁打核战，不要共产（或：宁要共产，不打核战）
（迎接贵宾用的）红地毯；隆重的接待
n. 红玫瑰；[史]英国兰开斯特家族族徽
n. 红海（印度洋西北的长形内海，在亚洲阿拉伯半岛同非洲东北部之间）
床下藏有赤色分子（指冷战中对同情共产主义者的恐惧）

trans.tran_cn: 红色的，（脸）涨红的，烧红的，红头发的
红色，红衣服，红颜料，红葡萄酒
